text: Janio Bikel Figueiredo da Silva (born 28 June 1995) is a Portuguese footballer who plays as a midfielder for Vancouver Whitecaps FC in MLS. He formerly played for SC Heerenveen, NEC and CSKA Sofia. ==Career== On 7 March 2015, Bikel made his professional debut with SC Heerenveen in a 2014–15 Eredivisie match against ADO Den Haag. On 14 June 2018, Bikel signed with Bulgarian club CSKA Sofia. Bikel moved to Canadian Major League Soccer side Vancouver Whitecaps FC on 28 February 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Portugal youth international footballers Category:Bissau-Guinean footballers Category:Portuguese people of Bissau-Guinean descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:NEC Nijmegen players Category:PFC CSKA Sofia players Category:Vancouver Whitecaps FC players Category:Portuguese expatriate footballers Category:Portuguese expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Portuguese expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Sportspeople from Bissau Category:Bissau-Guinean emigrants to Portugal
title: Janio Bikel
